name: Super vs. World
description:
Super vs. World is a local multiplayer 2D versus party game that lets up to 8 players combat each other and AI’s with classic headstomping, brick breaking, weapon throwing gameplay! Choose one of the unique characters and grab a variety of weapons and power ups to pummel the competition. Choose from a variety of game modes including Last Man Standing, Kill Count, King of the hill. (Capture the Flag mode will arrive in the November update)

Super vs. World lets you choose from a variety of theme packs each with unique characters and arenas. Including the 2020 US election pack, take your favorite character onto the debate stage arena!

At launch theme packs will be:
  • Election 2020
  • Halloween
  • Classic
  • (Christmas pack will be released early December)


Features include
  • Up to 8 local players simultaneously
  • Game modes including Last Man Standing, Kill Count, King of the hill. Play every-man-for-himself or on teams in every mode.
  • Completely customizable matches
  • Theme packs with unique characters and arena. New packs will be released for free over the next year.
  • Variety of weapons including fuse bombs, rockets, earthquake blocks, and exploding skateboards
  • Power ups including bullet-time and Invincibility


Can be played single player against AI’s. Controllers are required for multiplayer. Works via Remote Play.
(Although it can be played against AI's we feel the most fun way to play a game like this is always with other humans)
